author: peter_firmstone
msg: Fixed bug in Reggie, when random number returns Integer.MIN_VALUE, then Maths.abs returns a negative number.
Fixed a classpath issue in the qa suite, caused by separating reference collections.

author: kkolinko
msg: Add overridable denyRequest() method to RequestFilterValve.
The denyStatus attribute is used to change HTTP status code that is used when rejecting denied request.
E.g. to be 404 instead of default 403.
Backport of r1202565 in trunk, r1202570 in TC7.
